citations.narrative:
The licensee was not able to locate the facility contingency plan during the inspection.
If an emergency or natural disaster were to occur at the facility, the lack of a written contingency plan could impact animal
health if the staff are not prepared to respond to the situation appropriately.
Dealers must develop, document, and follow an appropriate contingency plan to provide for the humane handling,
treatment, transportation, housing, and care of their animals in the the event of an emergency or disaster.
Correct by: August 10, 2023.

There are three areas in the puppy enclosures, located by the office, that are in a state of disrepair. In the left-side
enclosure, the flooring material has been chewed so that there is only a small portion bordering the the left-hand corner of
the enclosure. In the outdoor run of the second enclosure, the wire fencing that attaches to the wall of the building has
become detached at the top and has a sharp point projecting to the inside of the enclosure. In the same enclosure, there
are pieces of white insulation that have become partially detached from the ceiling of the outdoor shelter area.
Failure to maintain primary enclosures can allow for sharp points and exposed materials which could result in injury to the
animals or allow for ingestion of foreign materials.
Primary enclosures must be kept in good repair to protect the animals from injury.

citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
There were a large number of flies in the indoor puppy area located behind the office. Several flies were observed flying
around the bedding and side walls of the enclosure. The licensee is utilizing sticky tape traps and fly bait, however, it does
not appear to be effective in controlling the flies in that area of the facility.
Failure to maintain an effective insect control program can allow for the introduction and spread of disease hazards to the
animals.
The licensee must ensure that a safe and effective pest control program is established and maintained at the facility.
Correct by : August 17, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
